# Chris Flemming

> Personal website of Chris Flemming — software engineer and engineering manager based in Australia.
>
> Topics: software engineering, engineering management, AI, data, geopolitics, climate, finance.

## Canonical

Base URL: https://chrisflemming.com/

## Main sections

- Home: https://chrisflemming.com/
- Blog: https://chrisflemming.com/blog/
- Projects: https://chrisflemming.com/projects/

## Key pages

- Live UV (project): https://chrisflemming.com/projects/live-uv/
- Blog post — UNESCO World Heritage List TSP: https://chrisflemming.com/blog/20240915-whl-tsp/
- Blog post — Live UV App (Android edition): https://chrisflemming.com/blog/20260106-live-uv-android/
